title: Is CVSR better than BVRIT College? - Quora
tags: Padmasri Dr. B.V. Raju Institute of Technology

response.answer_text: Bvrit,narasapur is better than cvsr looking into placements ,nirf ranking bvrit -168th rank ,cvsr 169 it’s ok but placements of cvsr is 143 but bvrit is 1000+ I say and highest package of 12.5 lakhs per annun and 135 companies has visited the bvrit campus.
No, BVRIT Education style is completly different when you compare to CVSR. BVRIT Is good when you compare with most of top rated engineering colleges
